thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com
thread.title: Liz

author: Liz
title: Liz
text: I have experienced a couple of Intrepid tours in Asia and I can't recommend them enough! Especially if you are looking for a tour that encompasses culture, adventure, diversity, history, amazing and fun all the whilst contributing back to the community you're visiting. The tours really provided great iteneraries which allowed you to make the most of your time there. The booking was seamless and communication with them was so easy...nothing was too much trouble. Book Intrepid!! You won't regret it!!
